item.title: 公众埋伏向阿尔伯塔省价值 1200 亿美元的养老金发出警报：政府负责
item.description: 这本该是一次增进感情的经历。【原文：It was supposed to be a bonding experience.】

item.title: 欧洲严阵以待，风电激增抑制价格上涨
item.description: 尽管未来一周欧洲西北部将出现低温和降雪天气，但风力发电量的飙升将使电价保持稳定。【原文：Soaring wind power generation will keep electricity prices in check, even as freezing temperatures and snow grip northwest Europe over the coming week.】

item.title: 美国银行策略师称特朗普就职前买入中国和欧洲市场
item.description: 美国银行（Bank of America Corp.）的策略师表示，进入明年，投资者应开始将更多资金投入美国以外的股票市场，因为货币和财政政策将变得更具支持性，以应对唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的关税计划。【原文：Investors should start putting more money into stocks outside the US heading into next year, as monetary and fiscal policy is set to become more supportive to counter Donald Trump’s tariff plans, according to Bank of America Corp. strategists.】

item.title: 特朗普选中疫苗怀疑论者肯尼迪，医疗保健股下滑
item.description: 当选总统唐纳德-特朗普表示，他将任命小罗伯特-肯尼迪（Robert F. Kennedy Jr.【原文：Pharmaceutical stocks declined as President-elect Donald Trump said he’s tapping Robert F. Kennedy Jr. to run the Department of Health and Human Services, potentially elevating a prominent vaccine skeptic and broader industry critic to a top role on health policy.】

item.title: 关注数据和美联储发言人，国债缩减一周跌幅
item.description: 由于交易商将注意力从唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）赢得美国大选转向最新的经济数据和美联储发言人，国债走高，收窄了本周跌幅。【原文：Treasuries edged higher, paring their weekly decline as traders turned their focus from Donald Trump’s US election victory to the latest economic data prints and Federal Reserve speakers.】

item.title: 尼日利亚通胀出人意料，再次加息成为可能
item.description: 尼日利亚的通胀速度超出预期，这使得再次加息成为可能。【原文：Nigerian inflation quickened more than expected, putting another interest-rate hike in play.】

item.title: 特朗普的反监管主张正是人工智能产业想听到的
item.description:
人们普遍认为，当选总统将扭转制定规则的企图，即在开发技术时将安全置于最高速度之上。【原文：

There’s a broad expectation the president-elect will reverse attempts to craft rules that put safety ahead of maximum speed in developing the technology.

】

item.title: KKR 将富士软的出价提高至 1 日元，高于贝恩的竞争对手出价
item.description: KKR & Co.提高了对富士软件公司（Fuji Soft Inc.【原文：KKR & Co. raised its offer price for Fuji Soft Inc. above a rival bid by Bain Capital, winning the backing of the Japanese software developer’s board.】

item.title: Grubhub 火拍后，Just Eat 迎来 2022 年以来最好的一周
item.description: Just Eat Takeaway.com NV 出售其濒临破产的美国业务，引发了该股两年多来最强劲的单周涨势。【原文：Just Eat Takeaway.com NV’s disposal of its ailing US business has sparked the stock’s strongest weekly rally in over two years.】

item.title: 大型科技交易商对特朗普第二任期持观望态度
item.description: 大型科技股对唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）赢得大选的反应相对平淡，因为投资者正在分析他的第二个任期可能会如何发展。到目前为止，许多人还在保留判断。【原文：Big Tech stocks have had a relatively muted reaction to Donald Trump’s election victory, as investors parse how his second term might play out. So far, many are reserving judgment.】

item.title: 预算困境和选举风险加剧罗马尼亚债券下跌
item.description: 投资者担心罗马尼亚的预算赤字不断扩大、选举接连不断以及经济增长出乎意料地疲软，使罗马尼亚的债务承受着越来越大的压力。【原文：Romania’s debt is under increasing pressure from investors concerned about a widening budget deficit, a string of elections and unexpectedly weak economic growth.】

item.title: 塞内加尔法耶将在议会临时投票中巩固权力
item.description: 塞内加尔总统巴西鲁-迪奥马耶-法耶（Bassirou Diomaye Faye）将力图在周日举行的议会选举中巩固其对权力的控制，以推动一系列必要的改革，稳定政府摇摇欲坠的财政状况。【原文：Senegalese President Bassirou Diomaye Faye will seek to consolidate his grip on power in parliamentary elections on Sunday to push through a series of reforms needed to steady the government’s shaky finances.】

item.title: 押注特斯拉帮助罗恩-巴隆战胜了指数。现在，他正受到特朗普的冲击
item.description:
以埃隆-马斯克的两家公司为首的买入并持有策略使 Baron Capital 长期表现优异。【原文：

A buy-and-hold strategy with two of Elon Musk’s companies at the top has Baron Capital outperforming over the long run.

】

item.title: 台积电《芯片法》获美国最终批准，资金将于今年到位
item.description: 拜登政府最终确定了对台湾积体电路制造股份有限公司（Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Co.【原文：The Biden administration finalized its Chips Act incentive awards for Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Co., marking a major milestone for a program meant to bring semiconductor production back to US soil.】

item.title: 莫桑比克 20 亿美元丑闻的核心金枪鱼船待售
item.description: 金枪鱼捕捞船队是一桩价值 20 亿美元的腐败丑闻的核心，这桩丑闻破坏了莫桑比克的经济，并引发了横跨三大洲的法庭诉讼。【原文：The tuna fishing fleet at the center of a $2 billion corruption scandal, which scuttled Mozambique’s economy and triggered court cases across three continents, is up for auction.】

item.title: 据称阿里巴巴考虑发行 50 亿美元债券
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士透露，中国科技企业集团阿里巴巴集团控股有限公司（Alibaba Group Holding Ltd.）正在考虑最快于本月发行总额相当于约 50 亿美元的债券。【原文：Chinese tech conglomerate Alibaba Group Holding Ltd. is considering an offering of bonds totaling the equivalent of about $5 billion as soon as this month, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 美元反弹势头强劲，英镑抹去今年涨幅
item.description: 由于投资者预计美国经济增长和通胀将走强，英镑兑美元汇率已放弃了今年的升势。【原文：The pound has relinquished its advance against the dollar this year as investors anticipating stronger US growth and inflation pile into the greenback.】

item.title: 美国股市已经逆转了大选后三分之一的涨势
item.description: 由于通胀持续高企和美联储的鹰派言论打压了市场情绪，周五上证 500 指数将继续回落，该指数在大选后的涨势已被削减了约三分之一。【原文：A pullback in the S&P 500 that’s already trimmed about a third off the index’s post-election rally is set to continue Friday, as sticky inflation and hawkish comments from the Federal Reserve weigh on sentiment.】

item.title: 欧盟称欧元区消费将回升但风险很高
item.description: 据欧盟委员会称，随着消费和投资障碍的消失，欧元区的经济增长将回升，尽管地缘政治构成的威胁越来越大。【原文：The euro area’s economic growth will pick up as obstacles to consumption and investment fade away, though geopolitics poses an increasing threat, according to the European Commission.】

item.title: 三星意外推出未来一年 70 亿美元回购计划
item.description: 三星电子公司计划在明年回购约 10 万亿韩元（72 亿美元）的自有股票，启动其历史上规模最大的股东回报计划之一。【原文：Samsung Electronics Co. plans to buy back about 10 trillion won ($7.2 billion) of its own stock over the next year, putting in motion one of the larger shareholder return programs in its history.】

item.title: 喙资本主义》，第三部分：解套系统
item.description:
这是我们的 "奇货可居 "特别系列的最后一期。【原文：

The final installment of our special Odd Lots series.

】

item.title: 喙资本主义，第二部分：万物鸡肋化
item.description:
特别奇趣系列第二章。【原文：

The second chapter in a special Odd Lots series.

】

item.title: 喙资本主义，第一部分：小鸡通胀
item.description:
《Odd Lots》特别系列第一辑。【原文：

The first in a special series from Odd Lots.

】

item.title: 印尼鹰航空公司解除塞蒂阿普特拉总裁的职务
item.description: 国有航空公司印尼鹰航空公司（PT Garuda Indonesia）总裁Irfan Setiaputra在给彭博新闻社（Bloomberg News）的短信中表示，已解除Irfan Setiaputra的总裁董事职务。【原文：State-owned carrier PT Garuda Indonesia has removed Irfan Setiaputra as president director, he said in a text message to Bloomberg News.】

item.title: 喙资本主义》，第 3 部分：解套系统（播客）
item.description: 喙资本主义》，第 3 部分：解套系统（播客）【原文：Beak Capitalism, Part 3: Un-Clucking the System (Podcast)】

item.title: 喙资本主义，第二部分：一切皆鸡肋（播客）
item.description: Odd Lots 团队通过鸡的视角分析美国经济。在本特别系列三部曲的第二集中，我们将着眼于鸡本身和养鸡人。因为这些年来，我们实际获得鸡肉的方式已经发生了很大变化，从散养到将鸡肉种植外包给独立承包商的大型家禽公司。农民们经常说，他们承担了饲养小鸡的大部分风险，而大型家禽公司却在养鸡业中扮演着重要角色。【原文：The Odd Lots team is analyzing the US economy through the lens of chicken. In this second episode of our special three-part series, we look at the birds themselves and the people who farm them. Because the way we actually get chicken has changed a lot over the years, with the industry evolving from backyard birds to huge poultry companies that outsource chicken growing to independent contractors. Farmers often say they are taking on most of the risk of raising chicks, while the big poultry compa】

item.title: 喙资本主义，第一部分：小鸡通胀（播客）
item.description: 人人都爱吃鸡。事实证明，这种不起眼的鸟类能告诉我们很多关于世界运行方式的信息。在这个由三部分组成的系列节目中，奇乐团队将通过鸡肉来探讨美国经济面临的一些最棘手的问题。在第一集中，我们将从消费者的角度来探讨鸡肉。为什么我们如此喜爱鸡肉？鸡翅或鸡蛋的价格是如何决定的？鸡肉能告诉我们如何看待通货膨胀？我们将讨论【原文：Everybody loves chicken. And, it turns out, that this humble bird can tell us quite a lot about the way the world works. In this three-part series, the Odd Lots team is exploring some of the thorniest issues facing the US economy, through the medium of chicken. In this first episode, we’re looking at chicken from the consumer side. Why do we love it so much? What goes into the price of something like a hot wing or an egg? And what can chicken tell us about the way we think of inflation? We speak】

item.title: 需求低迷影响香港经济增长，香港下调经济增长预测
item.description: 香港经济放缓至五个季度以来最弱的速度，显示出口和消费疲软带来的压力越来越大，因此香港官方下调了对今年经济增长的预期。【原文：Hong Kong lowered its official projection for growth this year after the economy slowed to the weakest pace in five quarters, showing mounting pressures from weakness in exports and consumption.】

item.title: 据说麦格理正在考虑出售菲律宾的电信塔公司
item.description: 据知情人士透露，麦格理资本正在考虑出售其在菲律宾最大的独立电信塔公司之一所持有的股份。【原文：Macquarie Capital is considering selling its stake in one of the largest independent telecommunication tower companies in the Philippines, people with knowledge of the matter said.】

item.title: 交易员减少降息押注，欧洲股市下跌；赛诺菲下跌
item.description: 在美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔发表谨慎言论后，交易商降低了对美联储 12 月降息的预期，欧洲股市因此下跌。【原文：European stocks fell as traders pared back expectations for an interest-rate cut by the Federal Reserve in December after cautious comments from Chair Jerome Powell.】
